title: Ola Electric opens 50 experience centers across India in single day
description: Ola opened its new experience centers across Mumbai, Jodhpur, Hoshangabad, Bengaluru, Lucknow, Varanasi, Nagpur, Vishakhapatnam to name a few." Fulfilling our commitment of opening stores near you across the country! 50 stores opened on Sunday. Launched by our Community Members. In a single day!!Who wants to inaugurate our next store" Bhavish tweeted.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
